name: pbmtocmuwm
description: pbmtocmuwm - convert a portable bitmap into a CMU window manager bitmap
body:
pbmtocmuwm

NAME

pbmtocmuwm - convert a portable bitmap into a CMU window manager bitmap

SYNOPSIS

pbmtocmuwm [pbmfile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads a portable bitmap as input. Produces a CMU window manager bitmap as output.

SEE ALSO

cmuwmtopbm(1), pbm(5)

AUTHOR
